description:
This is a market on the hammer price of Paul Cezanne's “L'Estaque aux toits rouges” (Lot 10C), scheduled to go up for auction at Christie’s The Cox Collection: The Story of Impressionism, Evening Sale, on November 11, 2021.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the final hammer price at auction exceeds $55 million, and “No” otherwise. 

Please note, the market resolves on the final hammer price at the live auction, which does not include buyer’s premium, fees, or taxes, and is not equivalent to “price realized” as listed on Christie’s website.

Please note, if the final hammer price equals $55,000,000.00 - this market resolves to "No".

-------------------------

The collection and its sale is presented online at Christie's website: https://www.christies.com/en/auction/the-cox-collection-the-story-of-impressionism-evening-sale-20376-nyr/

The auction will be transmitted live on Christie's Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbPBEQb2c

markets.question: Will Paul Cezanne's “L'Estaque aux toits rouges” (Lot 10C) sell for more than $55m at Christie’s on November 11?
